title: Software Engineer I
description: I work as a software engineer at GM2Dev. I work on a project that involves creating a web application using React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. I also work on the backend, creating RESTful APIs and integrating them with the frontend. I work on the frontend, creating reusable components and integrating them with the backend. I work on the database, creating tables, views, and stored procedures. I work on the deployment, creating scripts to automate the deployment process. I work on the testing, creating unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests. I work on the documentation, creating user manuals, technical manuals, and API documentation. I work on the maintenance, fixing bugs, adding features, and improving performance. I work on the monitoring, creating dashboards, alerts, and reports. I work on the security, creating firewalls, encryption, and authentication. I work on the scalability, creating load balancers, caches, and queues. I work on the performance, creating indexes, partitions, and queries

title: Full-Stack Internship
description: I worked as a full-stack developer intern. I worked on a project that involved creating a web application using React, Node.js, and SQLite. I also worked on the backend, creating RESTful APIs and integrating them with the frontend. I learned a lot about web development and gained valuable experience working in a team.

title: Computer Technician
description: I studied computer science at the Instituto Industrial Huergo. I learned about algorithms, data structures, software engineering, and computer architecture. I also learned about databases, networks, and operating systems. I worked on several projects, including a web application, a mobile app, and a game. I graduated with a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science.
